short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embed a simplified Postman tool in new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Happy Postman
Happy Postman is a Chrome extension that embeds a simplified Postman-like tool in new tabs, allowing users to easily send HTTP requests and manage API endpoints.

Features
Send HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Set custom headers and request body
Organize requests into groups
Save and manage multiple requests
User-friendly interface in new tabs
